original_title: GMOA strike to go ahead tomorrow as planned
original_body_lines: The Government Medical Officers Association (GMOA) said they will go ahead with the planned strike across the Western, Central, Southern and Eastern Provinces tomorrow.

However, GMOA Secretary Dr. Haritha Aluthge assured that specialized hospitals in these provinces, including maternity and children's hospitals, the National Cancer Institute, the National Institute of Mental Health, Nephrology treatment units, military hospitals and emergency services in all hospitals will not be affected by the trade union action.
